title: Born
description: I was born in Fukushima, Japan

title: The Move
description: Because of my fathers work condition, we moved to Washington C.H., Ohio

title: HTML/CSS
description: Via the social networking website "Myspace" I got exposed to HTML and CSS

title: Computer Science
description: enrolled in my first computer science class in High school.

title: Graduation
description: Graduated High School! Also meant that my parents moved back to Japan.

title: College
description: Started attending college for Respiratory Therapy, which later changed to Computer Science!

title: Macbook Pro
description: As a birthday present I receieved my first Macbook Pro!

title: Apple
description: Apple gave me a job as a Specialist at Easton Town Center, Columbus Ohio!

title: Genius
description: Promoted to Genius position at Apple! Dreams do come true!

title: WWDC 2014
description: Swift Programming Language announced! This sparked something inside me.

title: C#
description: Started taking my first programming course in collage. C#; Hello; World!

title: Swift
description: Started studying Swift/Objective-C and Cocoa touch development on my own. Thanks to developer.apple.com

title: WWDC 2015
description: Watched almost all WWDC 2015 videos and decided that I would try anything to attend WWDC and someday present at WWDC.

title: RWDevCon
description: Chosen as the free ticket winner for RWDevCon 2016. First Developer Conference experience!

title: WWDC 2016
description: This is my submission for the 2016 WWDC Scholarship. Thanks for taking the time. I did try to .reduce() this array of events.
